comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Culwalla Chambers (1912) was hailed as Sydney's first 'skyscraper', At the SW corner of King and Castlereagh Streets. Street level is the Louis Vuitton store now. More info - www.sydneyarchitecture.com/cbd/cbd4-014.htm
